node.title: Motorcyclist dies in serious crash in Waikato
node.description: A motorcyclist has died after a serious crash on Great South Road in Huntly, Waikato.
node.content:
["A motorcyclist has died after a serious crash on Great South Road in Huntly, Waikato.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "The crash was reported to police just after 2pm and involved three vehicles.", "The motorcyclist died at the scene.", "Diversions were put in place at State Highway 1 and Tainui Bridge, SH1 and the Taupiri roundabout, and Great South Road and Gordonton.", "Police said the road was expected to be re-opened shortly after 7pm.", "It takes the Christmas-New Year road toll this year to six.", "Eleven people died on the roads during the same period last year."]
